body:
This can be done through unsupported (window.onbeforeunload) code as:

Write a function (with in your webresource) responsible to check that the web resource is dirty or not?

function isMyWebResourceIsDirty()
{
}

Expose this function through Xrm object so the whole page can have access to this function as (this code be within your web resource):

Xrm.fnIsMyWebResourceIsDirty = isMyWebResourceIsDirty;

This code should trigger on form load (this code should be on your main Form)

$(document).ready(function () {
    window.onbeforeunload = function() {
      if(Xrm.fnIsMyWebResourceIsDirty()){
      alert('Save the changes first...');
      return;
      }
    }
}

I hope this will work for you.
title: Prevent navigation page with unsave data on web resource Dynamics CRM Online
